feed.title: Google Cloud: Cloud API Registry
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Cloud API Registry

entry.content:
Cloud API Registry is available in Preview.

Cloud API Registry lets you discover, govern, use, and monitor Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers and tools provided by Google, or by your organization through Apigee API hub. For more information, see the Cloud API Registry overview.
entry.summary: Cloud API Registry, a new service for discovering, governing, and using API servers and tools, is now available in preview. It supports both Google-provided and your organization's APIs through Apigee API hub, offering enhanced API management capabilities.
entry.title: Announcement: API Registry Now in Preview
